2015.context: Elastic N.V. is a search and observability company focused on Elasticsearch, observability, and enterprise search solutions. Elasticsearch adoption for log analysis and search. ELK stack.

2020.context: Elastic N.V. is a search and observability company focused on Elasticsearch, observability, and enterprise search solutions. IPO. Cloud adoption. Observability and security expansion.

competitors.name: Splunk
competitors.notes: Enterprise machine data analytics, primary commercial competitor

competitors.name: Datadog
competitors.notes: Cloud-native monitoring platform with log management

competitors.name: Sumo Logic
competitors.notes: Cloud-native machine data analytics

competitors.name: AWS CloudWatch

competitors.name: Graylog

2024.context: Elastic N.V. is a search and observability company focused on Elasticsearch, observability, and enterprise search solutions. ESRE (Elasticsearch Relevance Engine) for AI search.

competitors.name: SigNoz
competitors.notes: Open source APM, 2.5x faster than ELK for ingestion, uses 50% less resources, 13x faster for aggregation queries, uses ClickHouse

competitors.name: Graylog
competitors.notes: Centralized log management and SIEM solutions, offers Graylog Open open-source version

competitors.name: OpenSearch
competitors.notes: Open source fork after Elasticsearch license change, similar infrastructure challenges

competitors.name: Apache Solr
competitors.notes: Mature open-source enterprise search on Apache Lucene, direct competitor for over a decade

competitors.name: Splunk
competitors.notes: Unified security and observability platform for searching, analyzing, and visualizing data, on-premises or hybrid

competitors.name: Datadog
competitors.notes: Integrated monitoring and security platform with turn-key integrations across DevOps stack

competitors.name: OpenObserve
competitors.notes: All-in-one platform for logs, metrics, and traces with minimal complexity and costs

competitors.name: Better Stack
competitors.notes: More resource-efficient and faster than ELK with ClickHouse-powered storage

competitors.name: Papertrail
competitors.notes: Log management with real-time aggregation, searching, and monitoring

competitors.name: Loggly
competitors.notes: Cloud-based log monitoring using Elasticsearch under the hood

competitors.name: Logz.io
competitors.notes: Cloud-hosted ELK-based services using OpenSearch and OpenSearch dashboards

2025.context: Elastic N.V. is a search and observability company focused on Elasticsearch, observability, and enterprise search solutions. AI-powered search and observability. Vector search for GenAI.

competitors.name: Splunk (Cisco)
competitors.notes: Major competitor in log management, SIEM, and observability

competitors.name: Datadog
competitors.notes: Cloud-native monitoring platform competing in observability

competitors.name: OpenSearch (AWS)
competitors.notes: AWS-backed fork of Elasticsearch created after licensing changes

competitors.name: Sumo Logic
competitors.notes: Cloud-native machine data analytics for logs and metrics

competitors.name: Dynatrace
competitors.notes: Application performance and observability platform

competitors.name: CrowdStrike Falcon LogScale
competitors.notes: Log management solution from security vendor

competitors.name: Algolia
competitors.notes: Search and discovery API competing in enterprise search

competitors.name: Microsoft Sentinel
competitors.notes: Cloud-native SIEM competing in security analytics

mentionedBy.name: Datadog Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Integrates flawlessly with Elastic Stack, providing unified solution for monitoring/analyzing logs, metrics, and traces. Unified Security & Observability merges APM traces with threat intel. Vector search enables AI-driven log classification, cutting alert fatigue by 40%

mentionedBy.name: Dynatrace Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Built on Elastic Stack, offering APM, logs, and metrics capabilities
